Flash hider.description: Reduces the vertical recoil by {0:%}. The go-to attachment for most fully automatic weapons.

Compensator.description: Reduces the horizontal recoil by {0:%}. Strong on fully automatic weapons with more horizotnal than vertical recoil.

Muzzle break.description: Reduces the first shot recoil by {0:%}. The go-to attachment for all semi-automatic weapons.

Suppressor.description: Reduces the sound emitted from a weapon and removes bulled trails.

Extended barrel.description: Increases weapon base damage and reduces damage drop-off.
